EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_11/12/13Launch_Q413.Invite DB
EmailTemplate.subject: Please join Pivotal for a special announcement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
What platform will the next great software companies use? Join Pivotal for a special announcement at 10:00 AM PST on November 12, 2013 to find out! You will have the opportunity to hear from Pivotal executives, our customers and partners.
Please sign up now to reserve your spot! <http://www.gopivotal.com/theplatform> We'll send you exclusive early information and a reminder as the event gets closer. We're excited to have you join us.
Regards,
The Pivotal Team
Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit Our Blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/>
What's New at Pivotal? Read Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources>
